Furnish and install chrome plated piping: Provide chrome plated piping on all exposed piping above counter height in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Provide plumbing rough-in and final conn: Contractor shall provide plumbing rough-in and final connections for all foodservice equipment in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Provide plumbing connections for hot and: Furnish and install plumbing connections for hot and cold food unit drains in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Contractor shall furnish and install grease drain with removable cup in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Provide and install natural gas piping t: Provide natural gas piping to the make-up air unit in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Contractor shall furnish and install the gas valve in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Furnish and install an electric gas valv: Furnish and install an electric gas valve interlocked with the fire suppression and control system in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Provide and install rod support brackets: Contractor shall provide rod support brackets for sinks with twist lever waste in accordance with the Contract Documents.
Plumbing rough-in and final connection f: Provide plumbing rough-in and final connection for the integral sink in accordance with the Contract Documents.
